TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NSLinguisticTagScheme extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates classes of tags that are returned from a text classifier.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSLinguisticTagScheme Language = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates that tokens will be tagged with their language, if known.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSLinguisticTagScheme Lemma = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that tokens will be tagged with their stem, if known.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSLinguisticTagScheme LexicalClass = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that tokens will be returned for whether they are part of speech or whitespace, or their punctuation type if they are punctuation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSLinguisticTagScheme Name = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that tokens will be tagged as names of which they are a part.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSLinguisticTagScheme NameOrLexicalClass = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates that tokens will be tagged those tags indicated by and .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSLinguisticTagScheme Script = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Indicates that tokens will be tagged with the script in which they were written.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Foundation.NSLinguisticTagScheme Token = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that tokens will be tagged with information about whether they are words, whitespace, or punctuation.
